name: Polliwog
description:
A 3D platformer starring the jazzy frog, Polliwog! Run, jump, and grapple using your tongue around the jazz bar and eat all 42 bugs before time runs out.

CONTROLS

WASD to move

Space to jump

Shift to run

Right Click to aim

Left Click to shoot your grapple tongue

ESC to pause.

CREDITS

Programming - later36

Art - anormalhumanbean & kharalos

Music - thestach34

---

Made for GitHub Game Off 2021
